ygData.messageBody:
Yes, especially since it violates the rules of EQ and people who get caught
doing it can have their accounts terminated.
luv,
-Su


Some ppl are so pathetically addicted, that they would do anything to get
ahead, include dip into RL funds (sad, ain't it?)

Is there anyone out there that would actually pay real money for this??

Mike
